column1: relatablepoetryandquotes 161055752153 "2017-05-25 12:28:36 GMT" http://relatablepoetryandquotes.tumblr.com/post/161055752153/in-the-end-we-were-like-ghosts-hanging-on-to "“In the end we were like ghosts   hanging on  to the roof of the earth   halfway between worlds  too afraid to let go.” - Beau Taplin • G h o s t s  via via @afadthatlastsforever" True text

relatablepoetryandquotes 161055212764 "2017-05-25 12:01:42 GMT" http://relatablepoetryandquotes.tumblr.com/post/161055212764/he-has-achieved-success-who-has-lived-well "“He has achieved success who has lived well
column3: and loved much;Who has enjoyed the trust of pure women
column4: the respect of intelligent men and the love of little children;Who has filled his niche and accomplished his task;Who has never lacked appreciation of Earth’s beauty or failed to express it;Who has left the world better than he found it
column7: or a rescued soul;Who has always looked for the best in others and given them the best he had;Whose life was an inspiration;Whose memory a benediction.” - Bessie Anderson Stanley via @lifeofquotations" True text

column1: relatablepoetryandquotes 161054652608 "2017-05-25 11:32:05 GMT" http://relatablepoetryandquotes.tumblr.com/post/161054652608/in-vain-i-have-struggled-it-will-not-do-my "“In vain I have struggled. column2: only then can you recognize the light.” - Jane Austen via @quotemadness" True text
